cards.rules_text:
Dorry & Brogy can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each opponent that controls no creature with greater power than that creature.

Whenever Nekomamushi & Inuarashi deal combat damage to a player, choose one—
• Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.
• Draw a card.
• Put three +1/+1 counters on Nekomamushi & Inuarashi.

Trample; Hexproof from instants
When Straw Hat Luffy enters, target opponent becomes the monarch.
Whenever Straw Hat Luffy attacks the monarch, double his power and toughness until end of turn.

Skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Sacrifice two Treasures: Draw a card.
Whenever Nami deals combat damage to a player, create you may pay 2 life. If you do, create two tapped Treasure tokens.

Triple strike [i](This creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if Zoro attacked this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on him.

When Usopp enters, he deals 2 damage to up to one target creature with flying.
Whenever Usopp attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on him.
{2}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard: Return Usopp from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

When Nico Robin enters, surveil 3.
If you would draw your second card each turn, you may instead put target card from your graveyard into your hand.

Chopper enters with a +1/+1 counter on him.
{T}: For each counter on Chopper, add one mana of any color.
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. [i](If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)[/i]

Whenever Brook or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Encore {1}{W}{B} [i]({1}{W}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever Franky becomes tapped, put a surveil 2.

Haste; Melee [i](Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)[/i]
When Sanji enters, create a Food token.
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Sanji.

Prowess
Jinbe crews Vehicles using his toughness rather than his power.
Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

First strike
Whenever Red Hair Shanks attacks, he deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a Land you control enters, if it's your main phase, after this phase, there is an additional combat phase, followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of each combat this turn, untap all creatures you control.

Trample, indestructible
As long as there are six or more +1/+1 counters on Kaidou, he is a Dragon in addition to his other types and has flying.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, or an opponent loses the game, put two +1/+1 counter on Kaidou.

When Whitebeard enters, you become the monarch.
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Other creatures you control have indestructible.

Menace
Whenever Marshal D. Teach deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an instant, sorcery or creature card from that players graveyard without paying its mana cost. If it is an instant or sorcery card, exile it as it resolves.

Ward—Mill eight cards
Whenever you cast a spell, each player mills two cards and you draw a card.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

Menace
When Akainu enters, target player sacrifices a creature.
{5}: Draw a card for each creature that died this turn.

Haste
When Kizaru enters, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
{5}: Each attacking creature you control deals 1 damage to the player its attacking.

Vigilance
When Aokiji enters, put a stun counter on each creature you don't control.
{5}: Aokiji gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each tapped creature.

Whenever a creature blocks Smoker, that creature loses all abilities until end of turns.
Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Smoker the White Hunter.

When Rob Luccy enters, each other creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

Whenever a counter is put on Koby, untap him. He gains first strike until end of turn.
Training [i](Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, Wapol gains that permanent's abilities in addition to his other abilities until end of turn.
{BG}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wapol. Activate only as a sorcery.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Sacrifice five artifacts: Eustass deals 5 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

Renown 1 [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)[/i]
Whenever Buggy attacks, if he has a +1/+1 counter on him, for each opponent he isn't attacking, create a 1/1 token copy of him. It enters tapped and attacking that opponent.

Sir Crocodile gets +X/+X, where X is the number of land cards in all graveyards.
Whenever Sir Crocodile attacks, you may sacrifice a Basic land. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a Basic land. Each player that sacrificed a land this way creates a Desert land token with “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”

Other Merfolk you control get +2/+2.
{3}{G}: Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token.

Prowess
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Enel deals 2 damage to each opponent. If it is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, Enel deals 5 damage to target creature.

Moria enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Moria.
Whenever Moria is dealt damage, prevent that damage, then remove that many +1/+1 counters from him.

Menace
Whenever Doflamingo attacks, for each opponent, gain control of target creature they control until end of turn. It becomes attacking an opponent of its owners choice.

Flying, deathtouch
Whenever one or more creatures attack you, attacking creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

Flash
When you cast this spell, choose target spell. This spell becomes a copy of that spell except its name is Bon Clay, Okama Imitator. You may choose new targets and modes for this spell.
If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent you don't control, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

You may have Iceburg crew vehicles as if his power was 3.
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

First strike
{3}{U}, {T}: Each player chooses a nonland, nontoken permanent they control and own. That player gains life equal to that permanents mana value. Randomly redistribute control over those permanents among all players.

Lifelink
Tap three untapped creatures you control: You become the monarch. Activate only once and only as a sorcery.
As long as you are the monarch, other creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{U}: If you control six or less creatures named Satellite, create a 0/0 colorless artifact creature token named Satellite with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”

When Dragon enters, target opponent becomes the monarch.
Whenever Dragon attacks, create two 1/1 red Rebel creature tokens. If Dragon is attacking the monarch, those tokens enter tapped and attacking that player and gain indestructible until end of turn.

Haste
Whenever Sabo attacks, any opponent may have Sabo deal 2 damage to them. If no player does, you may exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.

When Leo enters, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
{1}{W}: Tokens you control get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn.

Destroy target creature. If a creature card is put into a graveyard this way, return it to the battlefield under your control. It gains decayed and becomes a Zombie in addition to its other types and abilities. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]

Choose one—
• Counter target spell.
• Counter all abilities.
Each opponent may discard up to two cards. For each player discarded less then two cards this way, you lose life and draw cards equal to the difference.

Spree [i](Choose one or more additional costs.)[/i]
+ {3}{B} — Destroy all creatures.
+ {1}{R} — Destroy all artifacts.
+ {B}{R} — Black Hole Liberation deals 3 damage to each opponent. If ten or more permanents left the battlefield this turn, it deals 6 damage to those players instead.

You may cast this spell for {U} if a player has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
Counter target spell. If a spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owners graveyard.

You may choose new targets for target spell.
Cycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]

Create a token copy of target creature you control. The copy gains myriad. [i](Whenever that creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)[/i]
Return target artifact, instant or sorcery card from from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile all tapped creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Toy artifact creature token.

Kicker—Sacrifice a creature
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, they also gain indestructible until end of turn.

The Thriller Bark enters tapped.
{T}: Add [b]{B}[/b].
Whenever The Thriller Bark deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Crew 3

Whenever a Pirate you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on The Going Merry.
Crew 2

Ward {3} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)[/i]
Whenever The Moby Dick attacks, other attacking creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Crew 6

Whenever The Going Luffy-Senpai attacks, you may have it become a copy of target attacking creature until end of turn.
Crew 3

When Queen Mama Chanter attacks, populate. [i](Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
When Queen Mama Chanter becomes crewed, crew each of up to two other target Vehicles.
Crew 8

The Thousand Sunny has lifelink as long as you control a white Pirate. The same is true for flying and blue, indestructible and black, double strike and red and hexproof and green.
Crew 4
Reach, ward {20}

Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Flashback {3}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
Jet Pistol deals 3 damage to any target.

When Foxy enters, gain control of target tapped creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control but don't own attacks, it gets +2/+0 and you draw a card, then discard a card.

Trample
Soulbond [i](You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)[/i]
Whenever a creature paired with Laboon dies, Laboon fights up to one target creature you don't control.

When Pearl's Invincible Shield enters, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a shield counter on it.
Equip {3}

Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.)[/i]
Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards discarded this way.

Buster Call deals 4 to each opponent and each creature they control. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Mountaincycling {1}
Each player chooses a creature they control, then sacrifices all other creatures. Then, each player loses life equal to the total power among creatures they control.

Vigilance; Melee [i](Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)[/i]
No more than one creature may attack each player each turn.
Whenever a blocking creature dies, its controller loses 2 life.

When Log Pose enters, search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Log Pose: Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.
Gum Gum Gatling deals 3 damage to each of up to X targets.
Double the power of target creature you control until end of turn. That creature deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature.

Gum Gum Whip deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.
Draw a card.

[i]({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)[/i]

[i]({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)[/i]

[i]({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)[/i]
As Temple Garden enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

[i]({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)[/i]
As Watery Grave enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

Choose target creature. Until end of turn, prevent all damage. When damage is prevented this way, Nothing Happened deals that much damage to the chosen creature. [i](If it is still on the battlefield.)[/i]

[i]({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)[/i]
As Godless Shrine enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for a Island or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Marineford enters tapped. When it does, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
{T}: Add {W}.

Amazon Lily enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
[i]Channel[/i] — {R}, Discard this card: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Egghead enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.

Enchant artifact
You control enchanted artifact.
For each opponent, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

Choose one—
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target creature can't block this turn. Goad it. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If that card was put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
When San Charlos enters, you may gain control of target creature until San Charlos leaves the battlefield. If you do, its owner goads San Charlos.

Vigilance
At the beginning of each combat, until end of turn creature tokens you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is equal to Garp's power.

When Waste Nothing enters, each player may discard a card. Then each player who did draws a card.
Whenever a player discards a card, create a tapped Treasure token.
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if they haven't attacked you this turn, you and that player each draw a card.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.
